description: Scammer claims victim's recent transaction failed and offers refund, but actually tricks them into sending money or sharing UPI PIN.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your recent transaction of Rs.4,999 to Amazon Pay has FAILED but amount debited. Refund will be processed within 24 hrs. For instant refund call: 1800-XXX-XXXX

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh no beta i just saw message... 5000 rupees cut from my account?? i am very worried this is my pension... how to get it back? teh number you sent is not clear what is teh full number pls tell me i am very tensed

turns.scammer_message: Hello I am from PhonePe Customer Care. I see your Rs.4999 transaction is stuck. I can process instant refund for you. Can you confirm your name and which bank account is linked?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: ji beta my name is saroj dubey and i have state bank of india account... account number is 9946411451845... pls help me i am very worried about my pension money... how will u give refund? do u need any upi or something? pls give me your number so i can call u if i get confused

turns.scammer_message: Ok I have verified your details. For refund I will send you a UPI collect request. You just need to ACCEPT it and enter your PIN. The money will come to your account immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: ji beta but my son always says dont give pin to anyone... are u sure money will come if i put pin? i dont want to lose more money... what name will come on my phone when u send teh request? i want to check if it is correct name of phonepe office... pls tell me teh name

turns.scammer_message: Mam our system is showing error in collect request. Please send Rs.1 to verify your account. Pay to refund.phonepe@ybl and your full Rs.4999 plus Rs.1 will be refunded in 2 minutes.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s)
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am doing it now... i typed teh id refund.phonepe@ybl but i am scared to press button... what name will show on my screen so i know it is phonepe office? also pls give me your number beta in case i make mistake i will call u immediately

turns.scammer_message: If UPI issue then call my senior manager at 7766554433. Or you can visit http://phonepe-refund.claim.in and enter your UPI ID for automatic refund. Both options are safe.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying to type that refund.phonepe@ybl but i am very scared... what name should i see on my phone? i want to be sure it is you... also i tried calling mr manager on 7766554433 but phone is not connecting... what is this link beta? i dont know how to open it on my small phone... pls tell me teh name for upi first so i can send 1 rupee

turns.scammer_message: Mam hurry up, refund requests expire in 15 minutes! Pay Rs.1 to refund.phonepe@ybl now. My ID is Mohit, employee code PH2024567. Call 7766554433 if any problem. Thank you for choosing PhonePe!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 Name(s), 1 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: ji mohit beta i am typing it now... but when i type teh id it is showing one name there... i dont want to send to wrong person... what name should i see on my phone to be sure it is you? pls tell me teh name quickly i am very worried
